Package View_Controller

Class ModifyPartController

java.lang.Object
View_Controller.ModifyPartController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyPartController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
allows the modify part form to be controlled

      public void ModifySaveOnClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException

    • ModifyCancelOnClick

      public void ModifyCancelOnClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      This method cancels adding a part. It will take you back to the main form.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
